summary: Garadoux has beaten his wife. His lawyer Fremissin is young and very shy, and therefore, not very efficient... Two years after, Garadoux is trying to seduce Cecile, but she prefers ... See full summary »
cast: Pierre Batcheff|Jim Gérald|Véra Flory|Maurice de Féraudy|Françoise Rosay|Madeleine Guitty|Yvette Andréyor|Léon Larive|Anna Lefeuvrier|Louis Pré Fils|Antoine Stacquet|Odette Talazac
title: Les deux timides
